scripts.start:electron:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli electron/index.ejs > public/electron/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env  budo electron/index.js:bundle.js --hot --live --dir public/electron --port 7788 -- -t babelify -t envify
scripts.start:interface:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli ipads/interface/index.ejs > public/interface/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env  budo ipads/interface/index.js:bundle.js --port 9966 --hot --live --dir public/interface --serve bundle.js -- -t babelify -t envify
scripts.start:experiment:web: NODE_ENV=development ejs-cli ipads/experiment/index.ejs > public/experiment/index.html && NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env budo ipads/experiment/index.js:bundle.js --port 9967 --live --dir public/experiment --serve bundle.js -- -t babelify -t envify
scripts.start: npm-run-all -l -p start:interface:web start:interface:css start:experiment:web start:experiment:css start:electron start:electron:web start:electron:css start:electron:server
scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production ejs-cli ipads/interface/index.ejs > public/index.html && browserify ipads/interface/index.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify  | terser > public/bundle.min.js
scripts.build:css: postcss --config postcss.config.js ipads/interface/postcss/index.css -o public/main.css && cssnano < public/main.css > public/main.min.css
